full_summary:
===============

**Tender Notice**

**Reference Number** EP745-241545/A

**Tender Title** 
DGA_EN/FR_TAG_10 000M+1opt_J: Translation Services for the Translation Bureau

**Objective**

Public Works and Government Services Canada is inviting qualified suppliers to submit a bid for translation services from English to French in the "General and Administrative Texts" category. The translation services will be acquired by the Translation Bureau and will involve translating up to 6,000,000 words.

**Eligibility Criteria**

To be considered for this bid, suppliers must be pre-qualified in Tier 3 for the field of General and Administrative Texts from English to French in accordance with the conditions of the Supply Arrangement EN966-140305.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

The bidder will be required to submit their proposal electronically. Suppliers who have been invited to submit a bid will receive the bid solicitation documents via email. Inquiries regarding the bid solicitation should be submitted to the Contracting Officer at TPSGC.PADDSBT-APRFPTB.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Bid Solicitation Details**

One contract will be awarded as a result of this bid solicitation. The selected supplier will be required to provide translation services for a period of two years, with an option to extend the contract for an additional year.

**Deadline**

The bid solicitation closes on January 8th, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time.

**Contact Information**

Josée Ménard, Contracting Officer
Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Phone: (613) 858-7638
Email: josee.menard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Notes**

* Suppliers are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the bidding procedures and requirements.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either French or English.
